user_query: I'm a food blogger and I'm looking for unique and interesting ingredients to feature in my recipes. Can you provide me with a list of all the available ingredients along with their nutritional information? Also, suggest a recipe that showcases one of these ingredients.

TaskList.description: Gather a comprehensive list of unique ingredients along with their nutritional information.
Select one unique ingredient from the list generated in step 1.
Find or create a recipe that prominently features the selected ingredient from step 2.
